value_i18n.en_US: Your open digital platform for making and re-using local public services

Digital Place for Local Public Services is your open digital platform for making and re-using local public services. Now it’s simple to build and re-use local services with cubes that are easy to connect together. Start by re-using over 150 ready-made cubes and create new services at your own pace. Now it’s easy to bring your services and information together in one place and give a consistent and accessible user experience.

Enable citizens and business to self-serve when they choose on their preferred device and browser. Drive efficiency by replacing expensive engagement channels with digital.

Digital Place presents you with over £5m of public service investment in proven reusable digital services to accelerate your digital transformation at less cost and less risk than building from scratch.

Learn more
How can open standards and reusable cubes help solve problems for local places?
Accelerate your public service transformation with Digital Place -- designed by public service for public service.
Benefits from over £5m investment in well designed, reusable digital components (Cubes)
Drive transformation faster while removing the cost and risk of starting from scratch
Achieve continuous ROI through a conveyor belt of new features at no additional subscription fee
Improve customer engagement and increase self-service to create efficienciescontent here.

Key Features:

  • Website and Microsite Templates
  • Content Management System
  • MyAccount (Citizen and Business Portal)
  • Case Management
  • Customer Contact Management (aka CRM)
  • Multiple Local Service Transactions
  • Multiple 3rd Party Connectors
  • Extensive Low Code Functionality
  • Responsive, Accessible, and Secure

Company Profile


Placecube builds open digital platforms that make your life simpler with cubes. Now your digital journey is easier, faster and better connected.
